original: Hey kids! You know when you send your friends a text message to say that you'll meet them at the mall? Well, that's how Lipurgex works. It sends a message to your brain to tell your body that it isn't hungry and women are evil. How cool is that?! Just think - you can spend all your lunch money on cigarettes! And, if you don't like Lipurgex, you can always sell the pills to the technoheads at recess.
translated: 嘿，孩子们！有没有给朋友发过短信，约他们在商场见面？嗯，这就是Lipurgex的原理。向大脑发送消息，告诉身体你还不饿，女人是魔鬼。是不是很酷？！想想吧，省下的午饭钱都能拿去买烟！而且，即便你不喜欢Lipurgex，也可以在课间把药卖给电子舞曲的爱好者。

original: You're never too young to start obsessing over your body image. Overweight people do not get prom dates or let into nightclubs. Lipurgex Little will make you popular. Just sit down in front of a video game  console and watch the weight drop off!
translated: 学会管理体态永远都不嫌早。超重的人找不到舞伴，也进不了夜店。小小Lipurgex能让你更受欢迎。坐在游戏机前，就能看见体重直线下降！

original: Lipurgex offers an exclusive pre-teen payment plan: Pop  now, Pay later! We will send you a bill  when you're 18. Don't worry - you'll get  a much better job as a slim person.
translated: Lipurgex更为少年儿童提供特别的付款方式：先用再买！等你18岁时，我们才会把账单寄给你。别担心，苗条的人往往能找到更好的工作

original: Discreet packaging: we make it look like a college information pack.
translated: 私密包装：我们采用的包装类似于大学资料袋。
